 Yeah, I know "rapture" isn't in Bible, however, "resurrection is" that's t=
he word the spirit's are using mostly.=C2=A0 Yep, we do have all the time i=
n the world right now, but even 1000 when ya think about it really isn't ve=
ry long.=C2=A0 I don't think anyone really knows the date, the world is goi=
ng to be made fresh, and we should all have body's that don't brake down, y=
ou will know who you are, from what I've heard we'll have a youthful look, =
and be able to get around really well.=C2=A0 Just don't count the chickens =
until the eggs have hatched=C2=A0 :)=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 sf

          =C2=A0                =
                   So if you're not Christian, you have all the time in the=
 world?
 
 Yeah, I get some saying it's this month, or next month, or Augus=
t, or October. I'll stick with December 2012, and even that I'm not taking =
to the bank.
 
 FYI, rapture ain't in the bible. I wouldn't want to be stuc=
k in/with this body --forever--wrong frikin' gender! And species.
 
 F-S

<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> Yeah, I=
 know "rapture" isn't in Bible, however, "resurrection is" that's the word =
the spirit's are using mostly.  Yep, we do have all the time in the wo=
rld right now, but even 1000 when ya think about it really isn't very long.=
  I don't think anyone really knows the date, the world is going to be=
 made fresh, and we should all have body's that don't brake down, you will =
know who you are, from what I've heard we'll have a youthful look, and be a=
ble to get around really well.  Just don't count the chickens until th=
e eggs have hatched  :)    sf<br>
</div>
